description: Infinix Zero Flip India launch date has been announced by the company. The first clamshell-style foldable phone from Infinix was introduced in select markets last month, in two colour options. Here's everything you need to know from the Infinix Zero Flip launch date to its expected specifications.
title: Infinix Zero Flip India Launch Date Set for October 17: Expected Specifications, Features

description: Xiaomi 15 Pro specifications and images have been leaked online, giving us a good look at its rear panel and possible colour options. The upcoming Xiaomi 15 Pro could be equipped with a triple rear camera setup. Here's everything you need to know about the Xiaomi 15 Pro and its specifications.
title: Xiaomi 15 Pro Specifications Leaked Alongside Images Hinting at Three Colourways

description: Oppo Find X8 detailed specifications have been leaked by a tipster, giving us an idea of what to expect from Oppo's next flagship phone, along with its purported launch date in China. Purported images of the handset have also surfaced online, ahead of its debut.
title: Oppo Find X8 Detailed Specifications, Live Images Leaked Ahead of Launch

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2024 Sale has brought some of the best deals and discounts on air conditioners and other home appliances. Customers in the market for a new air conditioner or looking to upgrade from their existing model can avail of discounts on air conditioners from brands such as Carrier, LG, Samsung, Voltas, Panasonic, Daikin, Godrej, and Hitachi at reduced prices during the Great Indian Festival Sale.
title: Best Deals on Air Conditioners During Amazon Great Indian Festival 2024 Sale

description: Amazon Great Indian Festival 2024 Sale is underway with discounts on smartwatch from brands like Noise, Boat, Amazfit, Fire-Boltt, Cult, and Redmi. Here are some of the best smartwatch deals ranging between Rs. 1,999 and Rs. 4,499 during the ongoing Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale.
title: Top Smartwatches Under Rs. 5,000 During Amazon Great Indian Festival Sale

description: Google is testing the use of check marks next to some companies in search results. The new feature is designed to help users identify verified sources and stay safe from fraudulent websites that mimic legitimate businesses or services and mislead users on the web.
title: Google Tests Verified Check Marks in Search Results to Help Users Identify Verified Sources

description: Meta Movie Gen has been unveiled by the company as a new AI model that can generate video and audio clips that appear realistic in response to user prompts, to compete with tools from OpenAI and ElevenLabs. Additionally, Meta showed off sample videos from Movie Gen featuring animals engaging in activities like swimming and surfing, and videos that use actual photos of people to show them performing various actions.
title: Meta Unveils Movie Gen AI Model Capable of Generating Video With Sound to Rival OpenAI
